channel.title: Whonix Forums Moderation Miscellaneous Discussion
channel.description:
This forum thread can be used to explain moderation action while not deflecting the main discussion in the original forum thread.
----
I've just now split the post https://forums.whonix.org/t/antix-linux-distribution/11039 from http://forums.whonix.org/t/make-a-kicksecure-iso/10846/3 and moved it into its own forum thread https://forums.whonix.org/t/antix-linux-distribution/11039. It wasn't directly related to the Kicksecure ISO. However, feel free to post a link into that topic to the new forum thread.
Also for the new forum thread, free to change the title such as from
> antiX Linux Distribution
to
> antiX - Kicksecure Hardened Distribution looking for Artwork
since that seems to be the primary intention.
If you wish to discuss ` antiX Linux Distribution` generally, which could be interesting, since the first independent third party Linux distribution based on (parts of?) Kicksecure or being a Kicksecure fork.

item.title: Whonix Forums Moderation Miscellaneous Discussion
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
This forum thread can be used to explain moderation action while not deflecting the main discussion in the original forum thread.

I’ve just now split the post antiX Linux Distribution from Make a Kicksecure ISO and moved it into its own forum thread antiX Linux Distribution. It wasn’t directly related to the Kicksecure ISO. However, feel free to post a link into that topic to the new forum thread.

Also for the new forum thread, free to change the title such as from

antiX Linux Distribution

to

antiX - Kicksecure Hardened Distribution looking for Artwork

since that seems to be the primary intention.

If you wish to discuss antiX Linux Distribution generally, which could be interesting, since the first independent third party Linux distribution based on (parts of?) Kicksecure or being a Kicksecure fork.

Read full topic
